attributes.action: launch a full independent enquiry into the events of 9/11
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we have never been given a proper explanation for what happened on that day. we've had four investigations into diana's death and only one unreliable inquest into 9/11, where nearly 3000 died. we, and those who died, deserve a full investigation. we even had to to fight for the first investigation. this isn't acceptable.
